  • Constructor Details

    • VirtualMachine

      public VirtualMachine (String id, String owner, String VMM, int coreCount, double allocatedMemory, double allocatedDisk, String operatingSystem)
      Constructor of which specifies the id, owner, VMM, core count, allocated memory, allocated disk and the running operating system.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      owner - the owner
      VMM - the VMM
      coreCount - the core count in the chip
      allocatedMemory - the allocated memory in gigabytes (GB).
      allocatedDisk - the allocated disk in gigabytes (GB).
      operatingSystem - the running operating system
